resources.string:
I am a software engineering student.

 I am enrolled in computer & communication engineering in Cairo university, I am in my last year of college. planning to create a 3D scanner application as a graduation project.

 I have been through several projects in college:
 - Developed Twitter clone using Flutter.
 - Developed a compiler using Yaml & Yacc.
 - Developed a pong game using Assembly.
 - Developed a restaurant management systems using C++.
 - Developed an Operating system simulator using C.
 - Developed an Office robot using Arduino.

 I am a passionate engineer, fast learner, have experience with working under pressure and I have a leadership qualities.
